## Chess.insufficientMaterial() method

Returns true if the game is drawn due to insufficient material, i.e. K vs. K, K vs. KB, or K vs. KN.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
insufficientMaterial(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
